meanings.sent1: Yesterday, I brung my lunch to school.
meanings.sent2: She brung her favorite book to the library.
meanings.sent3: The dog brung his toy to play fetch.
meanings.sent4: The sun brung warmth to the chilly morning.
meanings.sent5: The kind gesture brung a smile to her face.

meanings.sent1: He brung the groceries home from the store.
meanings.sent2: They brung the picnic basket to the park.
meanings.sent3: The wind brung the kite high into the sky.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter brung joy to the room.
meanings.sent5: The music brung back memories of childhood.
